price: 201 Ils ne croiront pas au Coran tant qu’ils ne verront pas le douloureux châtiment
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
